title: Father God
lyrics: Father God I wonder how I managed to exist without
But now I am your child I am adopted in your family
and I will never be alone
'cause Father God You're here beside me
raw_text:
Father God
Ian Smale
Em D
Father God I wonder how I managed to exist without
C Am
the knowledge of your parenthood
B7
and your loving care
Em D
But now I am your child I am adopted in your family
C Am
and I will never be alone
B7
'cause Father God You're here beside me
Chorus:
Em Am
I will sing your praises
D G
I will sing your praises
C Am
I will sing your praises
B7
forever more (x2)
Einde:
Em
Father God
